languages.text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.
languages.original_text: Целями этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} могут стать только союзники, у которых есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие хотя бы в одном комплекте оружия. Цель немедленно получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, во время которого можно использовать только способность Рывок. Рывок (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}): персонаж движется по прямой линии на расстояние до 6 клеток и атакует в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} цель, которая встретится ему на пути. Рывок можно применить, только если между персонажем и целью есть не менее 2 свободных клеток.

traits.locale_text: This ability can only target allies that have at least one melee weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immidiately gains an additional turn during which they gain the Charge ability and can only use this ability. Charge (0 AP): Allows the target ally to dash straight by 6 cells. If they collide with a creature during that movement, they attack that creature (even if it is an ally) with their melee weapon.

This ability can only target allies that have at least one melee weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immediately gains an additional turn during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 AP): Allows the target ally to dash in a straight line by 6 cells. If they collide with a creature during that movement, they attack that creature (even if it is an ally) with their melee weapon.

Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.

Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.

Цель немедленно получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, во время которого можно использовать только способность Рывок. Рывок (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}): персонаж движется по прямой линии на расстояние до 6 клеток и атакует в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} цель, которая встретится ему на пути. Рывок можно применить, только если между персонажем и целью есть не менее 2 свободных клеток.

The target immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: Целями этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} могут стать только союзники, у которых есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие хотя бы в одном наборе оружия. Цель немедленно получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, во время которого можно использовать только способность Рывок. Рывок (0 ОД): позволяет союзной цели пробежать по прямой на 6 клеток. В случае столкновения с каким-либо существом, даже союзным, цель атакует его своим рукопашным оружием.

Целями этой {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} могут стать только союзники, у которых есть хотя бы одно рукопашное оружие хотя бы в одном наборе оружия. Цель немедленно получает дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, во время которого можно использовать только способность Рывок. Рывок (0 ОД): позволяет союзной цели пробежать по прямой на 6 клеток. В случае столкновения с каким-либо существом, даже союзным, цель атакует его своим рукопашным оружием.

languages.text: 此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能释放在至少持有一件{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器的盟友身上。该盟友立刻获得一个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。额外回合期间，他们获得英勇冲锋的能力，而且只能使用此能力。 英勇冲锋（不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}）：沿直线向前冲锋6格，若在移动过程中与任何生物相撞，则对该名生物进行近战攻击。战士与目标之间必须至少隔着两个空格子，才能使用英勇冲锋。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.

此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能释放在至少持有一件{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器的盟友身上。该盟友立刻获得一个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。额外回合期间，他们获得英勇冲锋的能力，而且只能使用此能力。 英勇冲锋（不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}）：沿直线向前冲锋6格，若在移动过程中与任何生物相撞，则对该名生物进行近战攻击。战士与目标之间必须至少隔着两个空格子，才能使用英勇冲锋。

languages.text: Solo puede seleccionarse como objetivo de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} a un aliado que tenga al menos un arma de combate {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en uno de sus conjuntos de armas. El objetivo gana inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra durante el cual adquiere la capacidad de usar Carga (y únicamente esta capacidad). Carga (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}): el personaje se mueve un máximo de 6 casillas en línea recta y lanza un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo contra cualquier objetivo que haya en su camino. Es necesario un mínimo de 2 casillas libres entre el personaje y el objetivo para usar Carga.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: Solo puede seleccionarse como objetivo de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} a un aliado que tenga al menos un arma de combate {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en uno de sus conjuntos de armas. El objetivo gana inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra durante el cual adquiere la capacidad de usar Carga (y únicamente esta capacidad). Carga (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}): el personaje se mueve un máximo de 6 casillas en línea recta y lanza un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo contra cualquier objetivo que haya en su camino. Es necesario un mínimo de 2 casillas libres entre el personaje y el objetivo para usar Carga.

Solo puede seleccionarse como objetivo de esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} a un aliado que tenga al menos un arma de combate {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} en uno de sus conjuntos de armas. El objetivo gana inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} adicional durante el cual adquiere la capacidad de usar Carga (y únicamente esta capacidad). Carga (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}): el personaje se mueve un máximo de 6 casillas en línea recta y lanza un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo contra cualquier objetivo que haya en su camino. Es necesario un mínimo de 2 casillas libres entre el personaje y el objetivo para usar Carga.

languages.text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur auf Verbündete gerichtet werden, die mindestens eine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}waffe in einem ihrer Waffensets haben. Das Ziel erhält sofort einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, bei dem es ausschließlich die Fähigkeit Ansturm einsetzen kann. Ansturm (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): Der Charakter bewegt sich bis zu 6 Felder in einer geraden Linie und attackiert jedes Ziel auf seinem Weg mit einem Nahkampfangriff. Für den Einsatz von Ansturm müssen zwischen dem Charakter und dem Ziel mindestens 2 freie Felder sein.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur auf Verbündete angewendet werden, die mindestens eine Nahkampfwaffe in einem ihrer Waffensets haben. Das Ziel erhält sofort eine zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g}, in der es ausschließlich die Fähigkeit Ansturm einsetzen kann. Ansturm (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): Erlaubt dem ausgewählten Verbündeten, in einer geraden Linie 6 Felder zu sprinten. Wenn er während dieser Bewegung mit einer Kreatur zusammenstößt, greift er diese Kreatur (auch wenn es ein Verbündeter ist) mit seiner Nahkampfwaffe an.

Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur auf Verbündete angewendet werden, die mindestens eine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Waffe in einem ihrer Waffensets haben. Das Ziel erhält sofort einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, in dem es ausschließlich die Fähigkeit Ansturm einsetzen kann. Ansturm (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): Der Charakter bewegt sich bis zu 6 Felder in einer geraden Linie und greift jedes Ziel auf seinem Weg mit einem Nahkampfangriff an. Um Ansturm einzusetzen, müssen sich mindestens 2 freie Felder zwischen dem Charakter und dem Ziel befinden.

Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur auf Verbündete angewendet werden, die mindestens eine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Waffe in einem ihrer Waffensets haben. Das Ziel erhält sofort einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, in dem es ausschließlich die Fähigkeit Ansturm einsetzen kann. Ansturm (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): Der Charakter bewegt sich bis zu 6 Felder in einer geraden Linie und greift jedes Ziel auf seinem Weg mit einem Nahkampfangriff an. Um Ansturm einzusetzen, müssen sich mindestens 2 freie Felder zwischen dem Charakter und dem Ziel befinden.

languages.text: Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés qui disposent d'au moins une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} dans l'un de leurs ensembles d'armes. La cible bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire pendant lequel elle peut utiliser Charge et uniquement cette capacité. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}) : le personnage se déplace d'un maximum de 6 cases en ligne droite et lance une attaque de mêlée contre toute cible située sur sa trajectoire. Il doit y avoir au moins 2 cases libres entre le personnage et sa cible pour utiliser Charge.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés qui disposent d'au moins une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} dans l'un de leurs ensembles d'armes. La cible bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire pendant lequel elle peut utiliser Charge et uniquement cette capacité. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}) : le personnage se déplace d'un maximum de 6 cases en ligne droite et lance une attaque de mêlée contre toute cible située sur sa trajectoire. Il doit y avoir au moins 2 cases libres entre le personnage et sa cible pour utiliser Charge.

Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés qui disposent d'au moins une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} dans l'un de leurs ensembles d'armes. La cible bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire pendant lequel elle peut acquérir la capacité d'utiliser Charge et uniquement cette capacité. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}) : le personnage se déplace d’un maximum de 6 cases en ligne droite et lance une attaque de mêlée contre toute cible sur son chemin. Il doit y avoir au moins deux cases libres entre le personnage et sa cible pour utiliser Charge.

Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} s'applique uniquement aux alliés qui disposent d'au moins une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} dans l'un de leurs ensembles d'armes. La cible bénéficie immédiatement d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire pendant lequel elle peut utiliser Charge et uniquement cette capacité. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}) : le personnage se déplace d'un maximum de 6 cases en ligne droite et lance une attaque de mêlée contre toute cible située sur sa trajectoire. Il doit y avoir au moins 2 cases libres entre le personnage et sa cible pour utiliser Charge.

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は武器セットに{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器が1個以上入っている味方のみターゲットにできる。ターゲットは即座に追加の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を得る。このターン中は、突撃およびこのアビリティだけを使用できる。 突撃（0{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}）：直線に最大6セル移動し、進路上のすべてのターゲットに対して近接攻撃を繰り出す。突撃を使用するには、ターゲットとキャラクターの間に何もないセルが2つ以上必要。
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.

traits.locale_text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は武器セットに近接武器が1個以上入っている味方のみターゲットにできる。ターゲットは即座に追加の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を得る。このターン中は、突撃およびこのアビリティだけを使用できる。 突撃(0{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g})：ターゲットの味方は直線に6セルをダッシュできる。移動中に生物に衝突した場合、その生物（味方であっても）を近接武器で攻撃する。

languages.text: Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, yalnızca silah setlerinden birinde en az bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahı olan dost birimleri hedef alabilir. Hedef, anında bir ek {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} elde eder ve bu turda yalnızca Hücum ile bu kabiliyeti kullanabilir. Hücum (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}): Karakter, düz bir çizgide en fazla 6 hücre öteye doğru ilerler ve yoluna çıkan her türlü hedefe karşı bir yakın dövüş saldırısı gerçekleştirir. Hücum edebilmek için karakterle hedef arasında en az 2 boş hücre olmalıdır.
languages.original_text: This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only target allies that have at least one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon in one of their weapon sets. The target immediately gains an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} during which they gain the ability to use Charge and only this ability. Charge (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): the character moves up to 6 cells in a straight line and launches a melee attack against any target in their path. There must be at least 2 free cells between the character and the target to use Charge.
